description:
"The Friday Fellows" are a group of seven humans impersonating the seven lucky gods:
1. Hotei (fat and happy god of abundance and good health)
2. Juroujin (god of long life)
3. Fukurokuju (god of happiness, wealth and longevity)
4. Bishamonten (god of warriors)
5. Benzaiten (goddess of knowledge, art and beauty, especially music) -> shortend to Benten-sama
6. Daikokuten (god of wealth, commerce and trade)
7. Ebisu (god of fishers or merchants, often depicted carrying a sea bream)
It is tradition of the members of the Friday Fellows to eat a tanuki stew on new year. A different member each year has to catch and bring a tanuki to cook a stew from.
name: Kin`you Club
